title: Elektra
description: In the sequel to the blockbuster film Daredevil, Elektra Natchios is rescued by the mysterious ninja group known as The Chaste--who train her in the fine art of combat until her thirst for vengeance causes her to be expelled--and works as a freelance assassin, until she is forced to make a dangerous choice to save the lives of one man and his young child. Original. (A 20th Century Fox film, releasing February 2005, written by Raven Metzner & Stuart J. Zicherman, starring Jennifer Garner) (Science Fiction & Fantasy)
author: Yvonne Navarro
